comment:
Extracted Variables:
- x: number of trips made by the new company
- y: number of trips made by the old company
- new_one: number of gifts delivered per trip by the new company (50 gifts)
- old_one: number of gifts delivered per trip by the old company (70 gifts)
- new_one_: liters of diesel used per trip by the new company (30 liters)
- old_one_: liters of diesel used per trip by the old company (40 liters)

Definitions:
- x, y are decision variables representing the number of trips made by the new and old company, respectively.
- new_one: 50 gifts delivered per trip by the new company
- old_one: 70 gifts delivered per trip by the old company
- new_one_: 30 liters of diesel used per trip by the new company
- old_one_: 40 liters of diesel used per trip by the old company

Objective:
- Minimize Z = 30x + 40y

Constraints:
1. Total number of gifts delivered must be at least 1000: 50x + 70y >= 1000
2. At most 15 trips made by the new company: x <= 15
3. At least 40% of all trips must be made by the old company: y >= 0.4(x + y)
